```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(timevis)
library(kableExtra)
library(htmltools)
library(widgetframe)
library(htmlwidgets)
```


```{r timeline,echo=FALSE}
todayis <- Sys.time()
# Create the Disclose register dataframe
data <- data.frame(
      id =c(1:2),
      content=c("rOpenSci OzUnconf","R-Ladies Auckland Launch"),
      start=c("2017-10-26","2017-12-07"),
      end=c(NA,NA),
      website=c("https://ozunconf17.ropensci.org/","https://www.meetup.com/rladies-auckland"))
data %>%
  kable("html") %>%
  kable_styling(font_size = 16)
t <- timevis(data)
frameWidget(t)
